title: The Watcher and the War Train
description: Subject 44 is in a hopeless struggle to regain control of his mind. He is certain his thoughts are being listened to. He is also certain he is delusional. Come take the trip into Subject 44's mind and is it only in his head?The Watcher and the War Train is based on a true story of a young man struggling with the onset of schizophrenia.
author: Theodore Scott
